sentence.Network_en: He gave a feeble shrug and tried to squirm free.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无力地耸耸肩，扭动身体想要挣脱。

sentence.Network_en: Mentioning religion is a sure way to make him squirm.
sentence.Network_cn: 一提宗教就肯定会让他感到窘迫不安。

sentence.Network_en: Right now , serious programmer - type readers are beginning to squirm in their seats.
sentence.Network_cn: 说到这里, 严肃的程序员立即开始局促不安.

list.abs: squirming boys ; wiggly worms ; writhing snakes ., 局促不安的孩子 ; 蠕动的虫子 ; 蠕动的蛇.
humans are reduced to squirming masses ., 人格被降低 , 在痛苦中挣扎.
Du Xuan took the reflection for a squirming snake ., 杜宣花了一蛇蠕动反射.
To cause to twist or squirm ; contort ., 扭曲引起扭曲或蠕动 ; 扭曲.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: symbolic of writhing movement; probably associated with worm

entry.tran: (通常指因紧张不安或不适而)扭动，动来动去
entry.def: If you squirm, you move your body from side to side, usually because you are nervous or uncomfortable.

example.ex: He had squirmed and wriggled and screeched when his father had washed his face...
example.tran: 父亲给他洗脸时，他扭来扭去，尖声喊叫。

example.ex: He gave a feeble shrug and tried to squirm free...
example.tran: 他无力地耸耸肩，扭动身体想要挣脱。

entry.def: If you squirm, you are very embarrassed or ashamed.

example.ex: Mentioning religion is a sure way to make him squirm.
example.tran: 一提宗教就肯定会让他感到窘迫不安。

example.ex: ...the type of awful occasion that makes politicians squirm with embarrassment.
example.tran: 使政客尴尬不安的那种糟糕场合

means.word_mean: 1. to move in a twisting or contorted motion, (especially when struggling);

sentences.sentence: "The child tried to wriggle free from his aunt's embrace"

auth_sentence.content: I began to squirm when watching England games on TV.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I began to squirm when watching England games on TV.

auth_sentence.content: The words alone are enough to make many people squirm.
auth_sentence.res_content: The words alone are enough to make many people squirm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The words alone are enough to make many people squirm.

auth_sentence.content: He believes in the occasional squirm-inducing shot.
auth_sentence.res_content: He believes in the occasional squirm-inducing shot.

sentences.en: He was squirming on the floor in agony.
sentences.cn: 他躺在地上痛苦地扭动着。

sentences.en: The little boy squirmed with shame.
sentences.cn: 这个小男孩因羞愧而局促不安。
